kv1.5:6.3: Accantaṃ jahati, anavasesaṃ jahati, appaṭisandhiyaṃ jahati, samūlaṃ jahati, sataṇhaṃ jahati, sānusayaṃ jahati, ariyena ñāṇena jahati, ariyena maggena jahati, akuppaṃ paṭivijjhanto jahati, anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikaronto jahatīti?
kv1.5:7.3: Accantaṃ vikkhambheti, anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti, appaṭisandhiyaṃ vikkhambheti, samūlaṃ vikkhambheti, sataṇhaṃ vikkhambheti, sānusayaṃ vikkhambheti, ariyena ñāṇena vikkhambheti, ariyena maggena vikkhambheti, akuppaṃ paṭivijjhanto vikkhambheti, anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikaronto vikkhambhetīti?
kv1.5:8.1: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca accantaṃ jahati, anavasesaṃ jahati … pe …
kv1.5:8.5: Jahati puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca accantaṃ jahati, anavasesaṃ jahati … pe …
kv1.5:9.1: Vikkhambheti anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca accantaṃ vikkhambheti, anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti … pe …
kv1.5:9.5: Vikkhambheti puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca accantaṃ vikkhambheti, anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti … pe …
kv1.5:10.1: Jahati puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca na accantaṃ jahati, na anavasesaṃ jahati … pe …
kv1.5:10.5: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca na accantaṃ jahati … pe …
kv1.5:11.1: Vikkhambheti puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca na accantaṃ vikkhambheti, na anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti … pe …
kv1.5:11.5: Vikkhambheti anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca na accantaṃ vikkhambheti, na anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti … pe …
kv1.5:12.5: Rūpāvacaro maggo niyyāniko khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavo asaṃyojaniyo aganthaniyo anoghaniyo ayoganiyo anīvaraṇiyo aparāmaṭṭho anupādāniyo asaṃkilesiyoti?
kv1.5:12.7: Nanu rūpāvacaro maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī na bodhagāmī na apacayagāmī sāsavo saṃyojaniyo … pe …
kv1.5:12.11: Hañci rūpāvacaro maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī … pe …
kv1.5:12.13: saṃkilesiyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.5:13.1: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca maggo niyyāniko khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavo … pe …
kv1.5:13.5: Jahati puthujjano rūpāvacarena maggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca maggo niyyāniko khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavo … pe …
kv1.5:14.1: Jahati puthujjano rūpāvacarena maggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī na bodhagāmī na apacayagāmī sāsavo … pe …
kv1.5:14.5: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī na bodhagāmī na apacayagāmī sāsavo … pe …
kv1.5:15.1: Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:16.1: Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:18.3: Tiṇṇaṃ phassānaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ tissannaṃ saññānaṃ tissannaṃ cetanānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cittānaṃ tissannaṃ saddhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vīriyānaṃ tissannaṃ satīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādhīnaṃ tissannaṃ paññānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti?
kv1.5:19.1: Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:22.3: Nanu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā sotāpattiphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatāti?
kv1.5:22.5: Hañci tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā sotāpattiphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.5:22.7: Anāgāmimaggena oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ jahatīti?
kv1.5:23.1: Anāgāmimaggena oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ jahatīti?
kv1.5:23.3: Nanu kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatāti?
kv1.5:23.5: Hañci kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.5:24.1: Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:24.3: Ye keci dhammaṃ abhisamenti, sabbe te saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhahantīti?
kv1.5:30.4: “so hi nāma, bhikkhave, sunetto satthā evaṃ dīghāyuko samāno evaṃ ciraṭṭhitiko aparimutto ahosi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi aparimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
kv1.5:30.8: Ariyassa sīlassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā, ariyassa samādhissa, ariyāya paññāya, ariyāya vimuttiyā ananubodhā appaṭivedhā.
kv1.5:30.9: Tayidaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyaṃ sīlaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, ariyo samādhi anubuddho paṭividdho, ariyā paññā anubuddhā paṭividdhā, ariyā vimutti anubuddhā paṭividdhā, ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, khīṇā bhavanetti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
